content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[FactValuation]
(
    FactValuationKey BIGINT IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
    ParcelKey INT NULL,
    BuildingKey INT NULL,
    PersonKey INT NULL,
    CompanyKey INT NULL,
    ValuationAmount DECIMAL(18,2) NULL,
    OwnershipShare DECIMAL(5,2) NULL,
    LastTransactionDate DATE NULL,
    CONSTRAINT PK_FactValuation PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (FactValuationKey) NOT ENFORCED
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(ParcelKey),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
